wikipedia_page.main: Rear-Admiral John Phillip Edwards  (13 February 1927 – 12 December 2014) was a Royal Navy officer who later became bursar of Wadham College, University of Oxford. He was a trustee of the Oxford Preservation Trust.

response: * Phillip Edwards (Royal Navy officer) (1927–2014), British admiral
